summary.overview: The Voting App allows users to cast a vote for one of three candidates, view live voting results in a bar chart, and see detailed vote breakdowns. Users can also reset the votes to start a new voting session.
summary.predefined_options: The application provides three predefined candidates (Candidate A, Candidate B, Candidate C) for voting. The voting results are displayed in a bar chart with predefined colors for each candidate.

requirements.description: When the user clicks the 'Vote for A' button, the system increments the vote count for Candidate A, updates the total votes, and displays a confirmation message.
When the user clicks the 'Vote for B' button, the system increments the vote count for Candidate B, updates the total votes, and displays a confirmation message.
When the user clicks the 'Vote for C' button, the system increments the vote count for Candidate C, updates the total votes, and displays a confirmation message.
If the user has already voted (determined by a flag in localStorage), the system prevents additional votes and displays an alert message stating 'You've already voted!'.
The system dynamically updates the bar chart to reflect the current vote counts for all candidates whenever a vote is cast.
The system updates the 'Total Votes' count displayed on the page whenever a vote is cast.
When the user clicks the 'Show Results' button, the system displays the detailed vote breakdown, including the number of votes and percentage for each candidate.
The system calculates and displays the percentage of total votes for each candidate in the detailed results section.

When the user clicks the 'Reset' button, the system resets all vote counts to zero, clears the voting flag from localStorage, hides the detailed results section, and displays an alert message confirming the reset.
The system displays a confirmation message (e.g., 'Thank you for voting for Candidate A!') after the user casts a vote. The message fades out and disappears after 3 seconds.
The system ensures that the detailed results section is initially hidden and only becomes visible when the 'Show Results' button is clicked.
The bar chart displaying live voting results is responsive and adjusts its size based on the user's screen dimensions.
